description_html:
The Fulton Rocker by HBF and MNML re-envisions a traditional classic as a timeless, modern design. Fulton pairs an upholstered lounge of generous proportions with elegant materials to elevate the essential rocking chair, creating a soothing experience in a high-energy collaborative work environment or a quiet room. Fulton brings a much-needed acoustic and visual escape from a busy space with its curved design and quality of materials. With a 21st century interpretation of a rocking chair, HBF is responding to the needs of the ever transformative workplace.

This tranquil piece is gently cushioned in the lower back and seat, offered in both Ash and Walnut, and rests on a tubular metal base. The rocker’s runners are made of solid wood, recalling a rocking chair in its most classic form. The inner and outer shell can be upholstered in the user’s fabric of choice, offering a piece that can feel truly personal. Fulton’s use extends beyond the office; this piece is equally at home in residences as it is in hospitality or commercial spaces. Its inviting shape and gentle motion make it approachable and timeless.
